attributes.title: Awaken Your Secret Powers
attributes.description:
Awaken Your Secret Powers - Patanjali Yoga Sutras 94 - Nithyananda Morning Satsang 9 Jan 2011. In this sutra, Patanjali answers how to handle the secret powers hidden in your biomemory. Living enlightened master and avatar Paramahamsa Nithyananda describes in detail the word tapasaha as the practices through which your bio-memory falls in tune with all knowing (sat), all powerful (chit) and always blissful (ananda). Any practice that allows the biomemory to know its innate nature - sachitananda is tapasaha. It is not just mortification as translated by others. It is not always austerity. It is not always painful. Tapas sometimes is a very joyful, happy doing which you always wanted to do.

Kayendra siddhi is not just power but it is the ripening of biomemory.

When the senses are ripened through purification process of the body and biomemory, extraordinary powers are expressed through the body and biomemory.
